descriptionlist.description: Install emojiport and iOS 12.1 emojis in one package! Must have the emojiport repo installed, if you don't already, scroll down and add it. Source code is on github. I Used elements of the source of minimal hosts blocker to make this project. Open sourced on github.

changelog.change: iOS 10 support (not for meridan though!). Thanks to xxthepersonx for the iOS 10 fix!
